description:
As a user testing the demo application
  I want to login to The Internet Herokuapp
  So that I can access the secure area and verify authentication functionality

elements.name: Successful login with valid demo credentials

steps.name: I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should be logged in successfully
I should see the secure area page
I should see welcome message "Welcome to the Secure Area"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "invaliduser" and password "wrongpassword"
I click the login button
I should see login error message
I should remain on the login page
the error should contain "Your username is invalid!"

elements.name: Failed login with valid username but wrong password

steps.name: I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "wrongpassword"
I click the login button
I should see login error message
I should remain on the login page
the error should contain "Your password is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should see "success"
the page should show "Welcome to the Secure Area"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "invaliduser" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should see "error"
the page should show "Your username is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "wrongpassword"
I click the login button
I should see "error"
the page should show "Your password is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "" and password ""
I click the login button
I should see "error"
the page should show "Your username is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with valid demo credentials
I am on the secure area page
I click the logout button
I should be redirected to login page
I should see logout success message "You logged out of the secure area!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
the login page should be accessible
all form elements should have proper labels
the page should support keyboard navigation
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I try to access secure area directly without login
I should be redirected to login page
I should see message indicating authentication required
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should see login error message
I should remain on the login page
the error should contain "Your username is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password ""
I click the login button
I should see login error message
I should remain on the login page
the error should contain "Your password is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "" and password ""
I click the login button
I should see login error message
I should remain on the login page
the error should contain "Your username is invalid!"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to username field using tab
I type "tomsmith" in focused field
I navigate to password field using tab
I type "SuperSecretPassword!" in focused field
I submit form using enter key
I should be logged in successfully
I should see the secure area page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I attempt login with wrong credentials 3 times
I should see consistent error messages
I should remain on the login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should be logged in successfully
I refresh the page
I should still be on the secure area page
I should see welcome message "Welcome to the Secure Area"
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should be logged in successfully
I click browser back button
I should remain on the secure area page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
the page should load within 5 seconds
all essential elements should be visible
the page should be responsive
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
I am using a mobile device viewport
I navigate to "The Internet" login page
the login form should be mobile-friendly
I should be able to login on mobile
I login with username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
I click the login button
I should be logged in successfully on mobile
